Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: sighting detailsi had just picked up dinner, so as im walkimg inside with it and i look towards the south and i see 4 bright lights that i thoght might have just planes getting ready to land or something. i showed someone else and he said it definately looks werd, might be a ufo, but its probably just the landing gear on some planes. nothing too spectular happened but it did sttrike me as unusual. we were on a hill in mahopac looking south, it appeared that the crafts were somewhere above either somers\baldwin place or jefferson valley\yorktown heights. for a period of about a half hour, 4 ships floated aroumd displaying extremely bright lights on and off and really just floated aroumd during those 30 minutes i saw them. i lost them gurdually through the trees and called it a night but who lnows, maybe there were there longer.
Summary: On the hill where i live, i look towards the south and i see 4 bright lights far away.
